roleset.name: decorate
roleset.note: EMBELLISH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'embellish' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 9.8 and 25.3. (from embellish.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: At times, salesmen may embellish the inside information with ``the notion that this is some slightly shady, slightly illegal investment the person is being included in,'' says Mr. Cunningham.
example.arg: with the notion that this is some slightly shady, slightly illegal investment the person is being included in

example.name: more often just transitive
example.text: John-1 has a tendency *trace*-1 to embellish the truth.
